    • Method Detail

      • addBalance

        public int addBalance(int point)
        Calculates the player's balance. This is done by having the value from the CustomField array, specified by the shakervalue, added to the score.
        Parameters:
        point - the integer value to be added to the balance.
        minBalance - is there to make sure the balance does not go under 0.
        Returns:
        Balance

      • setBalance
